name: Message
description: Embedded information used inside DatasetLifecycle or Job to keep track of history.

id.description: id currently needed by limitation in embedsmanny

shortMessage.description: Short description of message, like datasetArchiveSuccesful

sender.description: User or role who triggered the message

when.description: Time when message was received. Will be filled automatically by the server, format according to chapter 5.6 internet date/time format in RFC 3339.

comment.description: Additional information relevant for this message
